Import data

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

measles_raw <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2020/2020-02-25/measles.csv')
```

```{r}
measles <- measles_raw %>%
  mutate(overall = ifelse(overall == -1, NA, overall)) %>%
  mutate_at(vars(mmr, overall, xmed, xper), ~ . / 100)
```
